page.title: 16Childrens Games
page.content: These are our most popular recreation games: Lions:A game for as many children as you like.The person who's on it has to try and touch the other children.As he touches them they join the chain.When everyone has joined the chain it is the end of the game. Hopscotch: A game for two or more players. Each player has a stone,which they throw onto square one.Then they hop up the court touching each square with a foot as they go.Then they pick up their stone and next turn start on the next number in sequence: one,two, three etc. If you miss your number then you miss that go.
